# sux-radio



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                | Type                             | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | Checked state              | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | disabled state             | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`    | label for the radio button | `string`                         | `undefined` |
| `name`     | `name`     | Name of the radio          | `string`                         | `''`        |
| `size`     | `size`     | size of the radio button   | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |
| `value`    | `value`    | Value of the radio         | `string`                         | `''`        |


## Events

| Event       | Description                          | Type               |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `suxblur`   | Fired when an element has lost focus | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `suxchange` | Fired when an element has lost focus | `CustomEvent<any>` |
